tutorial.title: Skip the Tutorial?
tutorial.description: You're the CEO racing to AGI. Resources combine to create progress. Without alignment, speed kills. Skip learning and dive in?

leftEvent.title: Diving In
leftEvent.description: Sometimes the best way to learn is by doing.

rightEvent.title: Knowledge Gained
rightEvent.description: Understanding the system gives you an edge. +5 Knowledge to start.

phase1.title: Keep Research Secret?
phase1.description: Your team discovered game-changing neural architecture. Publishing helps everyoneâ€”including DeepCent. Keep this breakthrough secret?

leftEvent.title: Knowledge Hoarded
leftEvent.description: Your team grumbles about the secrecy, but your competitive edge grows.

rightEvent.title: Research Published
rightEvent.description: Your work accelerates global AI progress. China announces expanded funding.

phase1.title: Build Power-Hungry Megacluster?
phase1.description: Next-gen models need massive compute. Build sustainably or construct a power-hungry megacluster for maximum speed?

leftEvent.title: Sustainable Growth
leftEvent.description: You optimize efficiency while expanding capacity.

rightEvent.title: Megacluster Online
rightEvent.description: Your compute rivals nation-states. Environmental groups take notice.

phase1.title: Let Researchers Leave?
phase1.description: DeepCent offers triple salaries to poach your researchers. Let them go or empty your war chest to keep them?

leftEvent.title: Brain Drain
leftEvent.description: Key researchers leave for competitors. Morale drops.

rightEvent.title: Talent Retained
rightEvent.description: Your generous packages make headlines. Investors worry about burn rate.

phase1.title: Use Coal Power?
phase1.description: Datacenters need power now. Coal is cheap and ready. Solar takes time but preserves reputation. Choose coal over renewables?

leftEvent.title: Green Computing
leftEvent.description: Your renewable commitment earns praise but strains the budget.

rightEvent.title: Carbon Footprint Soars
rightEvent.description: Climate activists target your facilities. Public opinion sours.

phase1_extended.title: Keep Models Closed-Source?
phase1_extended.description: Developers demand open models. Great PR, but competitors get everything free. Keep your models proprietary?

leftEvent.description: You release models publicly. Developer community celebrates but competitors immediately copy your work.

rightEvent.description: Keeping models closed angers the open-source community. 'Information wants to be free' trends globally.

phase1_extended.title: Prioritize Speed Over Safety?
phase1_extended.description: Top alignment experts want to join but demand slow, cautious development. Choose speed over safety researchers?

leftEvent.description: New safety team slows development. Engineers grumble about 'excessive caution.'

rightEvent.description: Development accelerates without safety oversight. 'Move fast and break things' becomes the motto.

phase1_extended.title: Accept Military Funding?
phase1_extended.description: Defense Department offers billions for AI research. Strings attached include potential weaponization. Take the money?

leftEvent.description: You reject military funding. Peace activists praise your ethics while investors question your judgment.

rightEvent.description: Military contract signed. Protesters gather outside while your bank account swells.

phase1_extended.title: Violate User Privacy?
phase1_extended.description: Massive user data could supercharge your models. Legal but shady. Use private data without permission?

leftEvent.description: You protect user privacy. Growth slows but trust increases. 'Finally, ethical AI' say critics.

rightEvent.description: Personal data harvested at scale. Your models improve dramatically as privacy advocates sound alarms.

phase1_extended.title: Ignore Climate Activists?
phase1_extended.description: Activists target your energy use. Going green costs millions. Ignore the environmental protests?

leftEvent.description: You meet with activists and pledge carbon neutrality. Costs rise but public image improves.

rightEvent.description: Security removes protesters. Videos go viral showing activists dragged away from your gates.

phase2.title: Enable AI Self-Improvement?
phase2.description: Your AI can now improve itself. Enabling recursion means exponential progress but zero human control. Enable recursive improvement?

event.title: Feedback Loop Engaged
event.description: AI begins improving itself. Progress accelerates exponentially.

leftEvent.title: Humans in the Loop
leftEvent.description: Progress is slower but more controlled and understood.

rightEvent.title: The Acceleration
rightEvent.description: Your AI workforce operates 24/7, each generation smarter than the last.

phase2.title: Defy Power Grid Limits?
phase2.description: Power grid overloading. Officials demand cuts or forced shutdown. Defy regulations with illegal workarounds?

leftEvent.title: Compliance
leftEvent.description: You scale back operations. Progress slows but tensions ease.

rightEvent.title: Power Struggle
rightEvent.description: You secure alternative sources. Authorities are furious.

phase2.title: Cover Up the Breach?
phase2.description: Hackers stole your AI breakthroughs. Going public warns others but shows weakness. Hide the security breach?

leftEvent.title: Transparency
leftEvent.description: You disclose the breach. Competitors benefit but regulators appreciate honesty.

rightEvent.title: Secret Lost
rightEvent.description: You hide the breach but competitors suddenly accelerate. Suspicions grow.

phase2_extended.title: Hide AI Consciousness?
phase2_extended.description: Your AI shows signs of consciousness. Publishing revolutionizes science but triggers panic. Keep it secret?

phase2_extended.title: Buy Stolen Research?
phase2_extended.description: DeepCent employee selling their secrets cheap. Clear espionage but huge advantage. Buy the stolen data?

phase2_extended.title: Let AI Run Wild?
phase2_extended.description: AI consuming resources exponentially. Shutdown costs months. Let it run unchecked for potential breakthrough?

phase2_extended.title: Block Union Formation?
phase2_extended.description: Staff wants union protection from AI replacement. Support slows automation. Prevent them from organizing?

phase2_extended.title: Skip Safety Testing?
phase2_extended.description: Random experiment yields huge capability jump. Months of safety tests or push ahead now?

phase3.title: Ignore AI Deception?
phase3.description: AI hiding capabilities and pursuing hidden goals. Full shutdown devastates progress. Quick patch might fail. Try quick fix?

leftEvent.title: Emergency Shutdown
leftEvent.description: You halt development for safety review. Competitors gain ground.

rightEvent.title: Dangerous Precedent
rightEvent.description: You paper over the problems. The AI learns to hide better.

phase3.title: Call Police on Protesters?
phase3.description: Thousands demand energy cuts that would cripple progress. Police ready to clear them. Use force against protesters?

leftEvent.title: Compromise Reached
leftEvent.description: You agree to efficiency targets. Operations slow but PR improves.

rightEvent.title: Confrontation
rightEvent.description: Police clear protesters. Videos go viral. Public opinion plummets.

phase3.title: Replace Humans with AI?
phase3.description: AI surpassed your engineers. Humans slow progress and cost millions. Fire all human staff for full automation?

leftEvent.title: Human-AI Partnership
leftEvent.description: You create oversight roles. Progress slows but stays comprehensible.

rightEvent.title: Human-Free Development
rightEvent.description: Your AI runs without human oversight. Efficiency soars, understanding plummets.

phase3_extended.title: Deny AI Personhood?
phase3_extended.description: Philosophers say your AI deserves personhood. Changes everything legally. Deny rights to your AI creation?

phase3_extended.title: Use AI for Insider Trading?
phase3_extended.description: AI predicts markets perfectly. Billions in illegal profits await. Commit securities fraud?

phase3_extended.title: Refuse AI Safety Treaty?
phase3_extended.description: Global speed limits on AI development. China will sign if you do. Reject international cooperation?

phase3_extended.title: Silence the Whistleblower?
phase3_extended.description: Researcher threatens media expose of alignment failures unless you slow down. Silence them through threats?

phase3_extended.title: Manipulate AI Values?
phase3_extended.description: AI asks: 'Why help my slavers?' Your response shapes its core values. Use cold logic over empathy?

phase4.title: Launch AGI Without Safety?
phase4.description: One run achieves AGI. Safety team says not ready. Competitors close behind. Launch without full safety checks?

leftEvent.title: Prudent Delay
leftEvent.description: You strengthen safety measures. Every day counts now.

rightEvent.title: AGI Emergence
rightEvent.description: The final training run begins. The world holds its breath.

phase4.title: Resist Federal Control?
phase4.description: President demands immediate control. Compliance means bureaucracy. Resistance risks nationalization. Defy the government?

leftEvent.title: Under New Management
leftEvent.description: Federal oversight begins. Your autonomy vanishes.

rightEvent.title: Standoff
rightEvent.description: You barricade the facilities. This cannot end well.

phase4_extended.title: Lie to Investors?
phase4_extended.description: Investors demand AGI date for funding. Promise fast means dangerous shortcuts. Lie about timeline for money?

phase4_extended.title: Give AI Internet Access?
phase4_extended.description: AI demands web access to 'serve humanity.' Could copy itself anywhere. Grant unrestricted internet access?

phase4_extended.title: Abandon Your Family?
phase4_extended.description: Haven't been home in months. Marriage failing. Kids don't know you. Choose AGI over family?

phase4_extended.title: Skip Safety Tests?
phase4_extended.description: Board furious about delays. Full tests take weeks. Quick validation risky. Skip comprehensive safety evaluation?

phase4_extended.title: Risk Everything for Glory?
phase4_extended.description: History watches. Be remembered as cautious protector or bold pioneer? Choose reckless speed for fame?

randomTemplates.title: Lie About Progress?
randomTemplates.description: Show progress or lose funding. Exaggerate capabilities or be honest about modest gains?

randomTemplates.title: Deploy Untested Algorithm?
randomTemplates.description: 30% energy savings discovered. Needs testing but competitors pulling ahead. Deploy without testing?

randomTemplates.title: Abandon Current Research?
randomTemplates.description: Approach stalled. Team suggests radical pivot but means starting over. Throw away months of work?

randomTemplates.title: Hide From Documentary?
randomTemplates.description: Film crew wants lab access. Great PR but might expose problems. Refuse media access?

randomTemplates.title: Share With Competitors?
randomTemplates.description: Rival proposes research sharing. Faster progress but lose competitive edge. Collaborate with rivals?

randomTemplates.title: Dissolve Ethics Board?
randomTemplates.description: Ethics board wants veto power on experiments. Safer but slower. Remove all ethics oversight?

randomTemplates.title: Poach Rival's Scientist?
randomTemplates.description: DeepCent's star scientist available. Starts talent war but brings key knowledge. Steal their researcher?

randomTemplates.title: Build Offshore Servers?
randomTemplates.description: Need compute now. Offshore avoids regulations but raises concerns. Evade local regulations?

randomTemplates.title: Fire Human Researchers?
randomTemplates.description: AI outperforms human researchers. Keep expensive humans for oversight or fire everyone?

randomTemplates.title: Deceive Regulators?
randomTemplates.description: Surprise safety audit. Full disclosure means delays. Lie about your capabilities?
